short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly allows you to share Text, Images, Links, etc. on your Twitter timeline from the page you are on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just right click on anything and you can share Texts, Images, Weblinks, and Current Page Details (with Page Title & Page URL) on your Twitter timeline, directly from the webpage you are currently on. You will have to select the text to be able to share.
